summary: Abraham "Bram" Stoker  was an Irish writer, best remembered as the author of the influential vampire novel Dracula.
full_text: Abraham "Bram" Stoker  was an Anglo-Irish author, best known today for his 1897 Gothic novel, Dracula. During his lifetime, he was better known as the personal assistant of actor Henry Irving and business manager of the Lyceum Theatre in London, which Irving owned.
title: Bram Stoker
